speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Jordan from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi, I'm doing alright, thanks. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm contacting you regarding an outstanding balance on your account. Before we proceed, can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your address for verification?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for verifying your information. You have an outstanding balance of $500. How would you like to settle this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay $200 right now and the rest later.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds good. I can set up a payment plan for the remaining balance. Would that work for you?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, I appreciate that. How do we proceed?

speaker: Agent
text: I will send you the details via email after this call. What's the best email address for you?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, John. You’ll receive an email shortly with all the payment details. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

speaker: Customer
text: No, that's all. Thank you for your help!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day. Goodbye.
